/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. Cars and people can be seen traversing the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape.
